attributes.action: build another two Type 45 (Daring Class) Destroyers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Type 45 (Daring Class) Destroyer programme will provide first class air defence to protect the Royal Navy fleet for decades. The RN is extremely relieved that HM Government has committed itself to building two new aircraft carriers but issues begin to arise should Britain enter into wars against technologically developed countries. Following the rational that for every ship in theatre, there are another two in refit and training, there will only ever be two on station around the world. Is that enough to safeguard a carrier task force?

While the government argues that the policy of 'fewer but better' is best, it cannot be denied that even the most technologically advanced ship cannot be in two places at once...
